New Records: Seth Lugo reached his 19th quality start of the season, tying for third in the league, and pitched 179 innings, leading the Major Leagues
Key Match Events: The Royals were no-hit into the eighth inning but tied the game in the ninth with a walk-off double by Jose Altuve
Paul DeJong hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning to tie the game
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro praised Lugo's performance
Players like Paul DeJong and Kyle Isbel were highlighted for their contributions
Mention of Vinnie Pasquantino's injury affecting the team's resolve
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mention of the Royals' top international prospect Caglianone
References to other news related to the Royals but not directly about the game
Others: Additional mentions of Seth Lugo's pitching adjustments and performance statistics
